Hierarch Kekropus:
Helios ruled over the skies and the earth. However, after suffering a huge blow in the war against the gods, he lay formant for a long time. He has only just now woken, up which means we should have a fighting chance.
Plus, we are not the pathetic races we once used to be. We shall not be enslaved helplessly like we were in the past.
While Helios is of course going to still be a formidable opponent, during the long time he was asleep, we have grown sufficiently powerful. Isn't that right?
Let us bring our powers together to defeat Helios, and bring about a world where the masters of the skies and the earth are us.
